    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateSnapshotRequest

        @Since(value="7.0")
public CreateSnapshotRequest(Long volumeID,
                                Optional<Long> snapshotID,
                                Optional<String> name,
                                Optional<Map<String,Object>> attributes)
        The Request object for the "CreateSnapshot" API Service call.
        Parameters:
        volumeID - [required] ID of the volume image from which to copy.
        snapshotID - (optional) Unique ID of a snapshot from which the new snapshot is made.
        name - (optional) A name for the snapshot.
        attributes - (optional) List of Name/Value pairs in JSON object format.
        Since:
        7.0

      • CreateSnapshotRequest

        @Since(value="8.0")
public CreateSnapshotRequest(Long volumeID,
                                Optional<Long> snapshotID,
                                Optional<String> name,
                                Optional<Boolean> enableRemoteReplication,
                                Optional<String> retention,
                                Optional<Map<String,Object>> attributes)
        The Request object for the "CreateSnapshot" API Service call.
        Parameters:
        volumeID - [required] ID of the volume image from which to copy.
        snapshotID - (optional) Unique ID of a snapshot from which the new snapshot is made.
        name - (optional) A name for the snapshot.
        enableRemoteReplication - (optional) Identifies if snapshot is enabled for remote replication.
        retention - (optional) The amount of time the snapshot will be retained. Enter in HH:mm:ss
        attributes - (optional) List of Name/Value pairs in JSON object format.
        Since:
        8.0

    • Method Detail

      • getVolumeID

        public Long getVolumeID()
        ID of the volume image from which to copy.

      • getSnapshotID

        public Optional<Long> getSnapshotID()
        Unique ID of a snapshot from which the new snapshot is made. The snapshotID passed must be a snapshot on the given volume. If a SnapshotID is not provided, a snapshot is created from the volume's active branch.

      • getName

        public Optional<String> getName()
        A name for the snapshot. If no name is provided, the date and time the snapshot was taken is used.

      • getEnableRemoteReplication

        @Since(value="8.0")
public Optional<Boolean> getEnableRemoteReplication()
        Identifies if snapshot is enabled for remote replication.
        Since:
        8.0

      • getRetention

        @Since(value="8.0")
public Optional<String> getRetention()
        The amount of time the snapshot will be retained. Enter in HH:mm:ss
        Since:
        8.0

      • getAttributes

        public Optional<Map<String,Object>> getAttributes()
        List of Name/Value pairs in JSON object format.
